basic_data.name: Flexible Niagara Falls Tour from Toronto

description: I offer flexible full-day private tours from Toronto and the surrounding area to Niagara Falls, Niagara wineries, Niagara-on-the-Lake, and other destinations with a certified guide-driver. This is a plan-as-you-go tour, allowing you to set the itinerary and avoid the crowds of a typical bus tour. You’ll enjoy the comfort of a personalized car tour at a price more affordable than Uber. Join us!

reviews.title: Private Tailor made trip from Toronto to Niagara Falls
text: I highly recommend this tour .

We have just had the BEST trip ever with Vlad. His communication via WhatsApp was extremely prompt and thorough whilst we were organising the day trip to Niagara Falls and made very suggestions for our itinerary.
He was outside our hotel ahead of time and the car ride was very comfortable and he was an excellent driver and gave us interesting bits of information along the way.

We spent a very full day in Niagara exploring many of the sights including the skyline tower ( both early morning and at night ) and the boat trip and the power station and at each point Vlad would drop us at the entrance and be waiting for us to take us to the next attraction. We also went to the rapids for a walk and to the cable car ride which were a few miles further down the river which Vlad suggested and I think I would have missed if Vlad hadn’t suggested them. They were also highlights of the trip . I would definitely recommend a trip to Niagara Falls with Vlad.

Ps. He also drove us to Buffalo, USA at our request to go to an amazing contemporary art gallery AKG which I would highly recommend and we managed to squeeze it in instead of Niagara on the lake , which I also hear is worth a visit.

reviews.title: Enjoyable day trip
text: We used Vlad as our driver for a day trip to Niagara Falls and the surrounding area.  He was knowledgeable about things to do in and around the Falls, and was able to provide both historical and geological background information about the Falls.  He was particularly knowledgeable about the infrastructure of the area, and the power and industrial importance of the falls.  He willingly accommodated our, perhaps less common, desires to walk around the nearby Dufferin Islands and other natural areas.  He was also quite patient with our wine tasting urges.  When we could not get into one winery, he was waiting nearby and quickly picked us up to take us to our next adventure.  He gave us plenty of time for our visits to our various points of interest, but also remained ready to move us on to the next attraction.

reviews.title: A great way to enjoy a visit to the Falls
text: We (4 adults) has a great day out with Vlad. He was extremely responsive and flexible in planning our outing and adjusting to interests during the day. Both Vlad and Niagara Falls greatly exceeded  expectations.  Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Great Time
text: We had a great time with Vlad and the flexible touring options. It was particularly helpful for us to be able to pick and choose the things we wanted to do and see, for as long as we wanted.

reviews.title: Custom Niagara Tour!
text: We booked a trip to Niagara Falls and Niagara on the Lake with Vlad. He was easy to book with, provided great recommendations and communicated very well! He was in front of our hotel at the agreed upon time and very flexible (as advertised). We went to Niagara Falls and did the two attractions we wanted and went off to visit 3 wineries and Niagara on the Lake. We felt the trip was a great value and allowed us to maximize our day and do exactly what we wanted. Vlad was so accommodating and so nice! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Fantastic!
text: Highly recommend!

If you are wondering whether a private flexible tour to Niagara Falls is for you, a day with Vlad as your driver and guide definitely is! He is an excellent host, his knowledge of the attractions available and information provided on the route is excellent. The flexibility he offers is fantastic, allowing you to plan your day exactly as you wish and spend the amount of time you want to spend at each place.  A really great trip.

reviews.title: Great day at Niagara Falls
text: We had a wonderful day with Vlad. He was timely, professional, thoughtful and warm. He was very knowledgeable and had good insight and suggestions for our activities. He handled the logistics and we could just relax and enjoy our day at Niagara Falls. Definitely a five star experience!

reviews.title: Great trip to Niagara with Vlad's Flexible Tour!!
text: We booked with Vlad for the Flexible Niagara Falls Tour from Toronto for Sunday 6/9/24, based on excellent Tripadvisor reviews. Vlad’s approach to touring is just what we wanted: he provides the transportation and is a knowledgeable guide; we decide what to do and see. Compared to other package tours, his flexible approach allowed us to customize our one-day trip to just the sites we wanted with as much time as we wanted. He suggested some of the “must see” places without a hard sell and based on our selection, he recommended an itinerary.

Vlad picked us up at our hotel promptly at 8 a.m. on Sunday. His car is very clean and comfortable. He’s also a great driver! As we traveled toward Niagara Falls, he pointed out features and history along the route. He took us right to the door of the Skylon Tower and then to the Niagara Welcome Center where we viewed the Falls and took in the Journey Behind the Falls tour and the Power Station + Tunnel. Throughout the day, Vlad linked up with us via text message for pickup times and locations. Besides Niagara Falls, we asked him to take us to the quaint town of Niagara-on-the-Lake where we spent several hours for a leisurely dinner and shopping. Along the way there he showed us various sites of interest.  Our day ended with the return trip to our Toronto hotel. It didn’t seem like a long drive as Vlad kept the conversation going on a wide range of topics. Vlad is courteous, knowledgeable and we highly recommend his Flexible Niagara Falls tour without hesitation!!
Paul & Maria

reviews.title: Vlad made our tour awesome !
text: We really enjoyed our tour from Toronto to Niagara Falls. And we credit Vlad for making it so. From his timely pick-up at our hotel to his knowledge about the entire Niagara Falls area, we were well taken care of. He helped us decide what to do and what to see. We used the WhatsApp to communicate when and where we needed to be picked up. Our day went as smooth as silk. He even took us to Niagara On The Lake for lunch. His cool and calm demeanor was extremely pleasant. He is a very safe driver. He gave us numerous options of things to do and see without any time pressure.  He was there for us and for whatever we wanted to do. We highly recommend Vlad for a great tour and a great day.

reviews.title: Private Niagara, A Personal Journey Through the Falls
text: During our Toronto visit, exploring Niagara Falls with Vlad's private tour was a real treat. The personalization of being picked up from our hotel set the tone for a day designed just for us. Conversing with Vlad was enjoyable; his knowledge spanned the essential facts about the Falls as well as some delightful lesser-known insights. The convenience of arranging pickups and drop-offs with a simple text message made everything feel effortless. Our day was packed with the quintessential Niagara experiences – a helicopter ride, the historic power plant, the tunnels, and the 'Behind the Falls' tour, each enhanced by the privacy and ease of our bespoke tour. The views from the Skylon Tower were a highlight, and a peaceful visit to Niagara-on-the-Lake perfectly concluded our adventure. An unexpected highlight was Vlad showing us a large beaver lodge, a testament to his knack for sharing unique natural sights alongside the main attractions. We ended our day back at our hotel, enriched by the memories and the exceptional service Vlad provided.

reviews.title: Worth every penny! Highly recommend!
text: This was an amazing trip to Niagara Falls and surrounding areas made special by being able to stop off and move on as suits you. The convenience of being collected from and dropped off at our hotel was most helpful . Our driver Vlad sets the bar high for any tour guide- extremely knowledgeable and informative about the area and about the country in general, exceptionally helpful and friendly and his recommendations were really great. As well as Niagara Falls & Skylon Tower he took us to the picturesque Niagara-on-the-lake,  stopping at key vantage points. Booking this trip was worth every penny - comfortable, thoroughly enjoyable and amazing to be able to customise your day to suit you. A true gentleman and a great driver too! We cannot recommend this tour highly enough! Made our first day in Canada a stand out and very special and memorable.

reviews.title: Day tour around Niagra Falls Canadian side
text: Vlad was such a friendly and professional individual and we had a great time with his service.
We recommend this service for anyone who enjoys flexibility in scheduling and customization  when touring Niagra Falls.
You can plan out what you want to see and Vlad will cater to your routes, or let him recommend some wine tasting and local attractions.

reviews.title: Niagra falls dec 30 2023
text: Well what a wonderful day.Vlad was on time very knowledgeable and friendly.Totally allowed us to customize how we wanted to spend the day.We never felt rushed.The vehicle was great.It was a exceptional day.Would highly recommend this trip and Vlad.He made my birthday very special.He had some great suggestions on where to go and was very attentive.Would do this tour again in a heartbeat

reviews.title: Ideal personal tour for a few people
text: We loved our trip to Niagara with Vlad. He was prompt, courteous, helpful and informative throughout. He took us from our hotel direct to the falls where we spent as much time as we wanted and then he was waiting for us to suggest options for the next place.
We went to Niagara by the Lake which was a quaint town ideal for a late lunch. We then went back to Niagara for the Christmas lights leaving when we wanted direct to our hotel, when we wanted.
If you are looking for a super flexible, personal service to Niagara from Toronto or thereabouts for 2-3 of you,  then Vlad is the perfect option.
NB Vlad’s car is not the fanciest but it is comfortable and the whole trip is great value.

reviews.title: Fully customisable private tour
text: You’ve got to book this tour if you don’t want to be in a bus with lots of other tourists and wish to be able to customise what you do along the way. Vlad was very knowledgeable about the area and it’s attractions. And he was very accommodating and enabled all the different activities I was keen on doing. Thanks for a wonderful day trip!

reviews.title: Great day at Niagra
text: Had a great day touring Niagra with Vlad as our personal tour guide. This experience is a great value compared to anything else else we found. Would highly recommend!!

reviews.title: Exceptional Service for a perfect day
text: The best part of the tour was Vlad.  Such a charming and knowledgeable man who made suggestions but let us choose what WE wanted to do and for how long.  So nice to choose our own schedule and level of activity.  It was all good - Niagra Falls; the "whirlpool"; Niagra-on-the-lake; and a short visit to a winery!  Vlad added as much history and good information as we desired and was very responsive to checking on other options of things we mentioned.  If he did not know the answer to a question we asked, he found the answer by the next stop.  Could not ask for a better driver/guide!

reviews.title: Great experience!
text: Excellent tour and service. Vlad is really knowledgeable about the area and made the day really interesting.
Having a private tour was very relaxing as it meant we weren’t rushed and we could spend the time doing what we wanted to do.
There were two adults and an 8yr old on this tour and we all really enjoyed it.
Would highly recommend!

reviews.title: Travel on your terms
text: They have been in constant contact with us on WATSapp for a few days, so we were able to discuss the process. We left early in the morning (7:30) but were happy to enjoy it until the end.
I enjoyed a lot of stories in the car, from Niagara stories to interesting ones.
The sightseeing itself was a bit disappointing because of the rain, but because it was raining, they turned the car around so we wouldn't get wet, which was very helpful.
I bought a lot of ice wine, but I'm glad I didn't have to carry anything heavy because I was able to leave it in the car.
